page.title: 01N. HARROGATE AND KILLINGHALL
page.content: This area covers the residential area to the north of{Harrogate,}and includes the former village of{Bilton} now practically indistinguishable from the rest of the town, and the huge estates bordering the Skipton Road known as{Jennyfields,}and {Grantley {Park.} To the north-west is the village of {Killinghall,}and in the north-east the {River Nidd}winds its' way through the{ {Nidd Gorge}past the former Scotton Mill, once one of 68 to be found in { {Nidderdale,}used for a variety of tasks from grinding the local corn, driving the machinery for the once famous flax mills, and crushing the lead ore mined from{Roman}days until the beginning of this century.
